txt.en: Turgon can be found at the South-gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Turgon.

'Your efficiency is exemplary. The Haradrim will remember this day so we must be on guard if they decide to retaliate. I am sure it will take some time for them to recover from the damage you caused, though.'
The Hillock can be found in Pelennor Fields, north-east of the South-gate.\n\nYou should defeat enemies upon the Hillock.

'The enemy has captured the best vantage point on the Pelennor -- the Hillock.

'Haradrim have turned the hill into a mighty encampment. I suspect they will use the vantage point to command troops in battle.

'Please go to the Hillock and defeat enemies there to disrupt their plans.'
Turgon is concerned about Haradrim forces that have taken the nearby Hillock and wishes to drive them off the best vantage point on Pelennor Fields.
